name.description: Human-readable name. Max length is 300 symbols.

unitCellFormula.description: chemical formula based on the number of atoms of each element in the supercell

basis.description: object containing an array of elements and coordinates in the supercell

lattice.description: object defining the lattice cell size and shape

derivedProperties.description: object defining the lattice cell size and shape

external.description: information about external sources of this material

exabyteId.description: Identity of the material inside exabyte materials bank

fileSource.description: File information if material was exported from POSCAR, XYZ or UPF file.

editable.description: Identifies when material editing is allowed. If value is `true`, then descriptive properties of the material editable.

removed.description: Identifies whether this material was removed

hash.description: Hash string which is calculated based on material's descriptive properties (lattice, basis). Used to identify equal materials.

icsdId.description: Corresponding ICSD id of the material
